p: Numerous results are reporting on the anti-trypanosomal activity the genus Artemisia, artemisinin, and its derivatives and other phytochemicals from Artemisia species ( Sen et al., 2007; Aloui et al., 2016). However, more intensive research is required to explore the full potential of diverse Artemisia species and their chemical ingredients for the eradication of trypanosomal infections ( Na√ü and Efferth, 2018).
